short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically skip the scary parts of popular family movies on streaming services like Disney+

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of constantly holding the remote so you can skip the scary parts before they start? Automatically skip the scary parts of popular family movies on streaming services like Disney+, so your little ones can enjoy the colorful characters and fun music, without getting traumatized by creepy scenes.

Supports titles including Aladdin, Bambi, Beauty & the Beast, Dumbo, Encanto, Fantasia, Frozen, Inside Out, The Jungle Book, The Lion King, The Little Mermaid, Moana, The Princess and the Frog, Sleeping Beauty, and Tangled.
